name: Pantheon
title: the Unbreakable Spear
lore: Once an unwilling host to the Aspect of War, Atreus survived when the celestial power within him was slain, refusing to succumb to a blow that tore stars from the heavens. In time, he learned to embrace the power of his own mortality, and the stubborn resilience that goes along with it. Atreus now opposes the divine as Pantheon reborn, his unbreakable will fueling the fallen Aspect's weapons on the field of battle.
blurb: Once an unwilling host to the Aspect of War, Atreus survived when the celestial power within him was slain, refusing to succumb to a blow that tore stars from the heavens. In time, he learned to embrace the power of his own mortality, and the stubborn...
allytips: Mortal Will activates after 5 spells or basic attacks - plan your way through fights to allow you to activate it more than once.
Whittle the enemy down with Comet Spears before you jump in.
If an enemy is going to get out of range of your Aegis Assault, you can recast the spell to immediately fire the shield slam.
enemytips: Pantheon's Aegis Assault makes him invulnerable from the front. Get behind him or wait it out.
Be careful near Pantheon if your health is low - a thrown Comet Spear executes low health enemies.
Grand Starfall gives several seconds of warning before Pantheon arrives. Use this time to get out of the way or to form a plan to deal with him.

riot_spells.name: Comet Spear
riot_spells.description: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Tap: Pantheon thrusts his spear, dealing {{ tapdamagecalc }} physical damage to enemies hit. Refunds {{ tapcooldownrefund*100 }}% of Comet Spear's cooldown.

Hold: Pantheon hurls his spear, dealing {{ holddamagecalc }} physical damage to the first enemy hit and {{ damagefalloff*100 }}% less to further targets.

Comet Spear critically strikes enemies below {{ crithealththreshold*100 }}% health for {{ executedamagecalcmodified }} physical damage instead.

Mortal Will Bonus: Deals an additional {{ empowereddamagecalc }} physical damage and slow the target by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Shield Vault
riot_spells.description: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Pantheon dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage and stunning them for {{ stunduration }} second.

Mortal Will Bonus: Pantheon's next attack strikes {{ empowerednumhits }} times, dealing a total of {{ empowereddamagemultcalcmodified }} physical damage.

riot_spells.name: Aegis Assault
riot_spells.description: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Pantheon braces his shield and engages enemies in a chosen direction for {{ shieldduration }} seconds, becoming immune to damage from that direction and dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage over the duration.

The last hit slams with Pantheon's shield, dealing {{ shielddamagecalc }} physical damage.

Mortal Will Bonus: Duration is increased to {{ empoweredshieldduration }} seconds (dealing {{ empowereddamagecalc }} physical damage over the duration).

riot_spells.name: Grand Starfall
riot_spells.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength to leap high into the air, then crashes down as a meteor at the target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ damagecalc }} magic damage to enemies in a line (decreased by up to {{ edgedamagereduction*100 }}% at the edges of the area).

Grand Starfall instantly readies Mortal Will.

riot_passive.name: Mortal Will
riot_passive.description: <titleLeft>Mortal Will</titleLeft><titleRight></titleRight><mainText>After @ActionsToEmpower@ spells or attacks, Pantheon's next basic spell is empowered.</mainText>

i1.name: Mortal Will
i1.blurb: After five basic attacks or ability cast, Pantheon's next basic ability (Q, W, or E) is empowered.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pantheon''' gains a stack when he lands a [[basic attack]] [[on-hit]] or casts an [[ability]], up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, '''Pantheon's''' next basic ability consume the stacks to gain additional effects.
i1.description2: '''Pantheon''' gains full stacks upon starting the game and upon respawning.

q1.name: Comet Spear
q1.blurb: Tap: Pantheon strikes in a direction, damaging all enemies in a line. Hold: Pantheon throws his spear in a line. Empowered: Enemies take extra damage and are slowed.
q1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Pantheon''' {{ct|windup|winds up|items=true,true,interrupts,false,interrupts,interrupts}} for up to 4 seconds, increasing ''Comet Spear's'' range while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 10%.
q1.description2: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|projectile|hurls}} his spear, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies hit, increased against enemies below {{as|25% of their '''maximum''' health}} but reduced by 10% against {{tip|minions}} and by 50% against enemies beyond the first.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|75 to 235}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|155 to 495}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Physical Damage|{{ap|75*0.5 to 235*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|100*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Secondary Damage|{{ap|155*0.5 to 495*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|200*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.description3: Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.35}} seconds causes '''Pantheon''' to instead thrust his spear, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit and {{sti|cooldown reduction|refunding}} 50% of ''Comet Spear's'' cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.
q1.description4: If '''Pantheon''' is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Comet Spear'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.
q1.description5: {{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} Deals an additional {{pp|20 to 240}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, affected by the previous damage reductions, to all enemies hit and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
q1.notes: * A retrieval animation will play while '''Pantheon''' remains idle.

w1.name: Shield Vault
w1.blurb: Pantheon leaps to a target enemy, dealing damage and stunning them. Empowered: Pantheon's next basic attack hits three times, each at reduced damage.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target enemy unit, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second.
w1.description2: {{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} '''Pantheon's''' next basic attack within 4 seconds strikes his target 3 times, dealing {{as|50% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} per hit, up to {{as|150% AD}}. Each hit applies [[on-hit effect]]s.
w1.description3: ''The ability can be dodged if the target moves 800 units away.''
w1.notes: * The 3 strikes that occurs after ''Empowered Shield Vault'' each apply a stack of {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}.

e1.name: Aegis Assault
e1.blurb: Pantheon sets his shield in a direction, gaining invulnerability to damage from enemies in that direction and dealing damage continuously. The last hit is extra powerful and still activates if E is canceled early. Empowered: Aegis Assault lasts longer.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' braces his shield for {{fd|1.5}} seconds in the target direction while striking in a cone, during which he is slowed for between {{pp|0; 0 to 50|key=%|0 (Forward); 60; 90(Strafe Left/Right); 120; 150; 180 (Backward)|type=Angle|showtype=false|key1={{degree}}}} based on his movement direction relative to the shield's facing direction. ''Aegis Assault'' cannot be interrupted by [[crowd control]].
e1.description2: For the duration, '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} against damage dealt by enemies ({{tip|turrets}} included) from the target direction, and deals {{ft|up to {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} over the duration|{{as|{{fd|8.{{recurring|3}}}}% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.125}} seconds}} to all enemies struck, reduced by 50% against {{tip|minions}}.
e1.description3: At the end of the duration or upon reactivation after {{fd|0.3}} seconds, '''Pantheon''' slams with his shield after a {{fd|0.25}} second delay, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
e1.description4: {{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} ''Aegis Assault's'' duration is increased to {{fd|2.5}} seconds, dealing {{ft|up to {{as|{{fd|166.{{recurring|6}}}}% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} over the duration|{{as|{{fd|8.{{recurring|3}}}}% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.125}} seconds}}.
e1.angle: {{tt|60|area of damage cone}}{{degree}} / {{tt|120|cone considered moving forward}}{{degree}}
e1.notes: * {{tip|Blink}} ability damage is calculated before the displacement.

r1.name: Grand Starfall
r1.blurb: Pantheon leaps into the air and then hurtles back toward a target location, damaging enemies as he passes through. Mortal Will activates immediately when he lands.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{ct|channel|channels|items=false|spells=false|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=false}} for 2 seconds to leap high into the air, then marks and reveals his destination before crashing down along the target area {{fd|2.4}} seconds later. He remains {{tip|vanish|vanished}} until the landing is complete.
r1.description2: The landing deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}, decreased by up to 50% at the edges of the area.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|300 to 700}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|300/2 to 700/2}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
r1.description4: ''Grand Starfall's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to 30 seconds if the channel is interrupted or canceled.
r1.notes:
* {{Pending for test}} (Live): {{ai|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} restriction, buff/debuff retention, untargetability bypasses ({{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}, {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}, [[Nexus Obelisk]], etc.).
* Abilities that target '''Pantheon''' will redirect to the last location.
** {{ai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}} will damage '''Pantheon''' during the travel, but will stay at the previous location.
* Pinging the ability will tell '''Pantheon's''' allies which {{tip|champions|enemy champions}} are in range.
